trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Brady
There were no other sightings in Brady on or around May 19th 1990
divs: Sighting Detailsthey moved almost as it they were playing chase with each other ... they would fly southeast - northwest and it seemed like they were covering 10's of miles in a split second ... lots of zig zagging patterns... then they would dissapear for a second and then show up instantly in another part of the sky ... it was not a spotlite because there were no lights showing up from the ground... i have seen this twice within a two year period in the same area ... it was in the western skies outside of Brady ... the first time i saw it i had two friends with me and they saw it too ... then the next time i saw it there about 6 of us
Summary: 3 to 4 Red Orbs - Looked like red stars moving in eratic formation
